attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2009-1576

Date: 2009-09-16

    Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of John Knubley, Deputy Minister, Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($206,700 - $243,200), effective July 1, 2009.
